text: Color and font values should inherit from standard fields.
<@U03UY195LKD>, I created as independent module, then how can i inherited those value from standard fields? could you please guide me over here?
In general, your module should inherit theme's standard field values at customer portal. If A theme is being used, check standard fields tokens and inherit it's values in module json fields.

H All
We have built a Public App which isnt yet available in market place. However we are able to installed using the URL. Now we want to give some users access to it. but unless i dont give them Super admin role for the first time they are not able to use it. Can some help me understand why. They are able to use it once used and i if i just give them Marketplace access permission but for the first time use it has to be Super Admin
